name: Heal
effect: Your first spell is one of the most useful. If your HP is low, chant the Heal Spell to raise your HP by 10~17 points.

name: Hurt
desc: Hurl magic fire balls at the enemy with Hurt. You can go far with this spell, damaging enemies for 8~12 HP.

name: Sleep
effect: Sleep is used during a battle to put the enemy to sleep. It doesn't always work.

name: Radiant
effect: Did you forget to bring a torch into the cave? If you have Radiant, it doesn't matter.

name: Stopspell
effect: When you encounter an enemy who uses magic, cast this spell to protect yourself. Very few monsters resist this spell!

name: Outside
desc: Deep in the underground caves and dungeons lurk terrible creatures. Escape from these places by chanting Outside.

name: Return
effect: Return whisks you back to Tantegel Castle from anywhere in the overworld of Alefgard.

name: Repel
effect: Like sprinkling Fairy Water, Repel keeps monsters at a healthy distance when you are in the countryside. The effect lasts for 127 steps.

name: Healmore
effect: More potent than Heal, Healmore restores 85~100 HP each time you chant it.

name: Hurtmore
effect: More devastating than Hurt; with Hurtmore you can challenge even the strongest enemies. Deals 58~65 damage.
